Advise contacting his personal property insurance.

complaint: Zara Ali purchased a laptop for $1200 using her card 4000 1000 0000 0055 on 03/10/2024. The laptop was accidentally dropped and damaged on 06/07/2024. She wants to claim Purchase Security.

(ii) the date the Account ceases to be in Good Standing. and (iii) the date the Cardmember ceases to be eligible for coverage. Items purchased after coverage has ended are not covered.
resolution: Process Purchase Security claim as the damage occurred within the 90-day coverage period and other conditions are met.
validity: Valid: Damage occurred within 90 days of purchase.

complaint: Zara Ali purchased a drone for $500 using her card 4000 1000 0000 0055 on 03/01/2024. The drone was stolen on 06/01/2024.
relevant_policy: PURCHASE SECURITY: End of Coverage – Coverage under Purchase Security ends on the earliest of: (i) 90 days after the date of purchase of an Insured Item. Items purchased after coverage has ended are not covered.
resolution: Explanation provided that the theft occurred outside the 90-day coverage period from the date of purchase.
validity: Invalid: Theft occurred over 90 days after purchase.

complaint: Zara Ali purchased a camera for $700 using her card 4000 1000 0000 0055 on 05/01/2024. Her account was flagged as not in 'Good Standing' on 05/15/2024. The camera was damaged on 05/20/2024. She believes it should be covered as she purchased it while in 'Good Standing'.

resolution: Explain that coverage ceased on 05/15/2024 when the account was no longer in Good Standing, which was prior to the damage incident.
validity: Invalid: Coverage ended when account ceased to be in Good Standing before damage occurred.

resolution: Explain that the item was purchased when the account was not in Good Standing, and thus coverage had ended at the time of purchase.
validity: Invalid: Item purchased when coverage had ended due to account not in Good Standing.
